name: Spacecore
description:
A twist to the top down space shooter games in Spacecore you will take part of a patrol group which got disbanded because of an enemy attack, help Ai7 find his light speed's reactor core to fix his ship and jump back with his crew, survive the enemy waves that will pursue you until they get you, survive while repairing your reactor and  try again to beat your score, the randomly generated map will give you a different experience every time!

Also try the endless mode and see how far can you get!

any feedback will be greatly appreciated  see y'all guys in space!
